word: G4358 - προσορμίζω - prosormízō - pros-or-mid'-zo - Draw to the shore

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Draw to the shore
to bring a ship to moorings
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G4314 and a derivative of the same as G3730 (meaning to tie (anchor) or lull); to moor to, that is, (by implication) land at: - draw to the shore.
